name: Counter terrorist Elite Sniper
description:
Counter terrorists Elite Sniper is an epic FPS grand battle shooter game. Step on battleground in 3D action packed sniper shooting game will allow you to experience the most challenging tricks to counter the terrorist in battlefield & be the last man standing man in the gun game. This Counter Terrorists Elite Sniper gun shooting game based on modern warfare battle games. The American shooter special sniper warriors are back now to take revenge from gangsters & deadly city fighters in this grand battle because they have ruined the peace of city. Counter all terrorists by the help of Elite sniper in this gun shooting game. Dangerous & breath-taking environment of battlefield will let you feel the thrill of modern counter attack. In this ultimate critical mission, you need to modern counter attack of ruthless terrorist's battle games with advance modern weapons as a sniper warrior. Become a real sniper gun shooter in this battle royal by using your superb gun game shooting skills & abilities to survive in sniper battlefield.
It is not just a game, but also a war against terrorism. You are the army commando of the elite sniper. As an Expert sniper shooter, your secret mission is to hold your sniper rifle, show all your sniper skills and prove you are the best sniper. Because of Counter Terrorists Elite Sniper addictive shooting effects, as well as the reality of this battlefield, let this game become the top shooting game. Take your sniper rifle and become part of this army commando game complete your mission and become elite shooter.
In Counter terrorists Elite Sniper game you have to complete the mission by shooting all the terrorists on the battlefield. This is not a game, but a war. In game, there are many dangerous terrorist you have to destroy all .The sniper game has beautiful 3D graphics, so that players feel like an elite commando sniper, in the battlefield on the use of excellent shooting skills to help the army to complete the difficult mission. Become a sniper hero.

Features:
• 3D graphics
• Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
• Simple and smooth operation
• a large number of advanced powerful weapons
• Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
• Challenges of increasing levels of difficulty
• Best quality attractive sound effects
• True shooting sound effects

In Counter terrorists Elite Sniper game, your duty is to shoot, kill and complete the mission. In this war game, prove your shooting skills, fight against the enemy. Accept the mission; now download this free exciting action shooting game. Have Fun!
